title: Shopkeeper这插件我有问题
author: za1425
txt_content: 为什么我每次用这插件，都要重启服务器。NPC才会出来，有什么办法弄到一打命令立刻出来

replies.author: mmartin20tw
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 mmartin20tw 于 2013-8-10 09:42 编辑 

如果你是用bukkit以外的伺服器(tekkit,forge......等),就會發生問題,shopkeeper官方網站(ShopkeeperOnBukkitDev)上有說。我用forge伺服器(MCPC+),不相信會出錯試了一下,發現不能和他們交易,只能設定交易......

原文:Note that this plugin is created to work with CraftBukkit. Bukkit does not have an API for some of the things necessary to make this plugin work. This means that other server software (Tekkit, Forge, etc) will not work with this plugin.

replies.author: 星の王子
replies.txt_content: 你要打/shopkeeper召喚出來= -=要設定的話就要shift+右鍵設定、火焰的那個是刪除、羊毛是換衣服0///0、鐵的那個改名~其他的自己琢磨吧0w0
